entry.title: Saturday: Chance of showers. High 7. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers this afternoon. Snow level 600 metres. Wind south 20 km/h. High 7. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Saturday 11 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clearing. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Clearing this evening. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Saturday 11 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early in the morning. 30 percent chance of flurries or rain showers in the morning. Wind becoming south 30 km/h gusting to 50 early in the afternoon. High 9. Wind chill minus 5 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Saturday 11 March 2023
